question: On which date, the 2019 edition of World Tsunami Awareness Day (WTAD) is observed?
explanation: The World Tsunami Awareness Day (WTAD) is observed every year on 5th of November to spread awareness about precautionary measures against tsunami and share innovative approaches to risk reduction. In 2019, the day promotes Target (d) of the \"Sendai Seven Campaign,\" which focuses on reducing disaster damage to critical infrastructure and disruption of basic services.
